text: Hey what are some of the defacto tools/packages for plotting shapefiles using Julia? I found PlotShapefiles.jl but that doesn't seem to be very standard. Any suggestions? Thank you!

elements.text: Hey what are some of the defacto tools/packages for plotting shapefiles using Julia? I found PlotShapefiles.jl but that doesn't seem to be very standard. Any suggestions? Thank you!

text: Shapefiles.jl has Plots.jl plotting recipes defined for it's tabular data types, I just tagged the release that includes that. Besides that there are a few threads about this if you search choropleth on Discourse. We're currently working on getting GeoMakie in shape again as well.
